titleStmt.title: Act ratifying all former lavvs for the secuity of the Protestant religion. At Edinburgh, the thirteenth day of August, one thousand six hundred and eighty one.
titleStmt.author: Scotland.
Scotland. Convention of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the Heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal coat of arms precede title.
